item.title: Librespot Picore Player
item.description: I wanted a stable headless Spotify player for my living room. It has to run on a RaspberryPi and boot fast in order to turn it on only when needed with a switch. We will build a tcz extension to install on piCore Player. The purpose is to gain stability and performance compared to the LMS version. Sources: librespot PiCore Player Build Librespot must be cross-compiled and placed in the sbin folder as librespot.
